messages.content:
This is the most important election in a generation.

On December 12th I am asking you to place your trust in me again to represent you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voted against triggering Article 50. Voted against all forms of Brexit in Parliament repeatedly, and always will.

mentions.candidate: I am the only remain candidate who can beat the Tories and their plans for a hard Brexit.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Voting for the Lib Dems, or any other party, risks handing Ealing Central and Acton back to the Tories.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Four years ago Labour won by only 274 votes.

issues.brexitEurope:
I voted against triggering Article 50.
I've voted against all forms of Brexit in Parliament repeatedly, and I always will.

community.content: Remember, there is nothing 'tactical' about voting against a remainer and lifelong local.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Phil Kemball on behalf of Rupa Huq, both at Ruskin Hall, 16 Church Road, W3 8PP. Printed by Solopress, 9 Stock Road, Southend-on-Sea SS2 5QF.

quotes.text: This is the most important election in a generation.
